author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J (delivering the grounds of decision of the court):
casename: Law Society of Singapore v Fun Huay Yew
coram: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J; Chao Hick Tin JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: C R Rajah SC (Tan Rajah and Cheah) and Tan Beng Swee (Tan Beng Swee) for the applicant; The respondent absent
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Show cause action/Advocate and solicitor feigning payment of money to client and absconding with client's money/Whether amounting to grossly improper conduct/Appropriate order to be made/Sections 83(2)(b), 98(5) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2001 Rev Ed)
